channel.title: [317] cloudyscape [317] needs help aswell
channel.description:
Hi, cloudyscape is my new server it is really fun to talk with people and stuff kuz lol thats all we can do i have took a blank source and said i'm going to make my own ideas so i have so far now when your making a server you run into some things you might now know what to do lol thats me!
now as my staff list is full and meny people find the ip on runelocus ( down right now idk why) or on moparscape they say this is a bad server or they might be hackers something like that.
now i still go to school ( im 15) and i try to host a 24/7 server and its been doing good but when people come get on my server and make it go down when im not hear then it no longer on for like most of the day ( so plz don't hack me)
any ways shops are a Bi#@! i cant get it right i always mess up and have to redo everything....
as far as i see i could not find any help on youtube i see there are videos but i still mess up so idk.... ( so if anyone has like teamviewr or something and will help me plz send me a pm on my servers forums {http://cloudyscape.darkbb.com/forum.htm}
anyways it is a nice server and i hope it will become big one day.

item.title: [317] cloudyscape [317] needs help aswell
item.dc:creator: @cloudslife cloudslife
item.description:
@cloudslife wrote:

Hi,
cloudyscape is my new server it is really fun to talk with people and stuff kuz lol thats all we can do i have took a blank source and said i’m going to make my own ideas so i have so far now when your making a server you run into some things you might now know what to do lol thats me!

now as my staff list is full and meny people find the ip on runelocus ( down right now idk why) or on moparscape they say this is a bad server or they might be hackers something like that.

now i still go to school ( im 15) and i try to host a 24/7 server and its been doing good but when people come get on my server and make it go down when im not hear then it no longer on for like most of the day ( so plz don’t hack me)

any ways shops are a Bi#@! i cant get it right i always mess up and have to redo everything…

as far as i see i could not find any help on youtube i see there are videos but i still mess up so idk…
( so if anyone has like teamviewr or something and will help me plz send me a pm on my servers forums
{http://cloudyscape.darkbb.com/forum.htm}

anyways it is a nice server and i hope it will become big one day.
